definitions.definition: Disbelief or uncertainty (about something); ( countable ) a particular instance of such disbelief or uncertainty.
examples: There was some doubt as to who the child's real father was.
I have doubts about how to convert this code to JavaScript.

definitions.definition: A point of uncertainty, especially a yes/no or a multiple-choice question

main_definition: ( uncountable , countable ) Disbelief or uncertainty (about something); ( countable ) a particular instance of such disbelief or uncertainty.
secondary_definitions: ( countable , obsolete or India ) A point of uncertainty, especially a yes/no or a multiple-choice question
